医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
替泽帕肽在超重和肥胖成人减肥方面优于索马鲁肽对于超重或肥胖的成人，替泽帕肽比索马鲁肽能显着减轻体重，而胃肠道不良反应没有显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Tirzepatide-outperforms-semaglutide-in-weight-loss-for-overweight-and-obese-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Tirzepatide-outperforms-semaglutide-in-weight-loss-for-overweight-and-obese-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15492b9f-cdd1-4bfa-8131-0d5c51d2e7e3 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 02:38:00 -0400 Tirzepatide outperforms semaglutide in weight loss for overweight and obese adults
60 年的历程：纳米粒子彻底改变了核苷酸输送研究人员追踪了用于核酸递送的脂质纳米粒子 (LNP) 60 年的演变，强调了它们通过更安全、更有效的治疗彻底改变基因治疗的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/60-years-in-the-making-Nanoarticles-revolutionize-核苷酸-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/60-years-in-the-making-Nanoarticles-revolutionize-核苷酸-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=791952e1-5a56-4bc3-b46a-0ad3ebce8​​957 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 02:10:00 -0400 60 years in the making: Nanoparticles revolutionize nucleotide delivery
世界上第一张人脑脂质图被绘制出来科学家发现，脑组织中93%的脂质在白质和灰质、皮层下、视觉和运动皮层以及负责决策、社会行为和其他功能的前额叶皮层中分布不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Worlde28099s-first-map-of- human-brain-lipids-created.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Worlde28099s-first-map-of- human-brain-lipids-created.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60c7a74e-fac9-4667-81fe-4d04e8dd2c09 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 02:08:00 -0400 World’s first map of human brain lipids created
新型设备使用简单的血液测试来检测早期肺癌昆士兰大学的研究人员设计了一种设备，可以通过简单的血液测试来检测早期肺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Novel-device-uses-a-simple-blood-test-to-detect-early-stage-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Novel-device-uses-a-simple-blood-test-to-detect-early-stage-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b41e786-08b1-4b5e-92a5-e39ecc2073e0 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 02:02:00 -0400 Novel device uses a simple blood test to detect early stage lung cancer
酶的突破可能会彻底改变绿色癌症治疗的生产曼彻斯特大学的科学家发现了一种更有效、更可持续的方法来制造肽类药物，在抗击癌症方面显示出良好的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Enzyme-breakthrough-could-revolutionize-the-production-of-greener-cancer-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Enzyme-breakthrough-could-revolutionize-the-product-of-greener-cancer-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cb86233-4bb3-41a3-83d3-ff45c83aa4b5 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 01:57:00 -0400 Enzyme breakthrough could revolutionize the production of greener cancer treatments
新指南可以帮助减少与意外出血相关的不必要的转诊英国更年期协会 (BMS) 推出了新的全科医生联合指南，以帮助减少与意外出血相关的不必要的转诊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/New-guidelines-can-help-alleviate-unnecessary-referrals-lated-to-unexpected-bleeding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/New-guidelines-can-help-alleviate-unnecessary-referrals-lated-to-unexpected-bleeding.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02818889-8bbc-44ca-9bd1-984f43c328f0 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 01:54:00 -0400 New guidelines can help alleviate unnecessary referrals related to unexpected bleeding
靶向α疗法为胶质母细胞瘤患者带来希望一种治疗最恶性脑癌（胶质母细胞瘤）的新方法在临床前环境中显示出强大的前景，提高了目前平均生存率超过 18 个月的希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Targeted-alpha-therapy-offers-hope-for-glioblastoma-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Targeted-alpha-therapy-offers-hope-for-glioblastoma-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18a2d2ff-9238-4799-a65e-4673f748695e Wed, 10 Jul 2024 01:51:00 -0400 Targeted alpha therapy offers hope for glioblastoma patients
研究显示牛奶中的牛 H5N1 流感病毒构成重大健康风险研究描述了牛乳中 H5N1 流感病毒的致病性和传播动态，强调了重大的公共卫生风险和潜在的哺乳动物传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Bovine-H5N1-flu-virus-in-cow-milk-poses-significant-health-risks-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Bovine-H5N1-flu-virus-in-cow-milk-poses-significant-health-risks-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6355a8d-2d2d-41d1-8b68-6d83f62bfb69 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 01:37:00 -0400 Bovine H5N1 flu virus in cow milk poses significant health risks, study shows
研究发现肠道芽囊菌与更健康的饮食和更好的心脏健康有关肠芽囊菌与更健康的饮食和改善心脏代谢结果有关，表明它对人类健康有益。这项全球研究强调了基于肠道微生物组组成的个性化营养的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Gut-Blastocystis-linked-to-healthier-diets-and-better-heart-health-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Gut-Blastocystis-linked-to-healthier-diets-and-better-heart-health-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=094e0382-8f3b-4518-9ec9-9ccb6ebc72a5 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 01:20:00 -0400 Gut Blastocystis linked to healthier diets and better heart health, study finds
